name: iberian
content:
the Iberian Peninsula
Add to word list
Add to word list
(also Iberia) the area of land that consists of Spain, Portugal, Andorra, Gibraltar, and part of France: His ancestors had been expelled from the Iberian Peninsula during the Spanish Inquisition.
See more
relating to the Iberian Peninsula: We stayed in a villa on the Iberian coast. Iberian cuisine
